channel.title: Script Seller & buyin site
channel.description:
Hello,
This site was put up it genral to help people find scripts to buy and sell scripts themselfs. There is also a feedback system if you like what you bought and you thought the trade went good go to there itrade system my one is this http://rscbot.frostpages.net/itrader.php?u=1 basicly the itrade system is linked by the users id. If you have trouble finding there itrader profile ask them for it.
The site will be ran by me, Ramenryoko And ephemeral we will be moddin all the selling and buyin going on to make sure it is ran as good as we can make it.
When selling your scripts make it clear what you are selling. in this format
[code] Title: Selling blah bah blah Price: 1$! Payment: paypal w/e Info: How to contact you.[/code]Well thats all for now
http://rscbot.frostpages.net/index.php
Flame all you like this isnt my account lol..

item.title: Script Seller & buyin site
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

so this is like a forum where if people want some coding done for there server, they put a post and someone does it for the money? if so, could come in handy for me.

Read full topic
